name: Golden Sanitizer
description:
Golden Sanitizer

Golden Sanitizer is an endless shooter-platformer game where your goal is to survive as long as you can from the virus. You got two option, end the virus or ended by the virus, you can avoid the virus or shoot the virus with your golden sanitizer.

Credits :

- Gerardo Keandre Lisrianto (A.K.A. HeadrusH) : Game Programmer, Game Designer, 2D Artist, Audio Engineer - instagram.com/keanndree

-Fathi Annaufal Soblia (A.K.A. annaufalfathi) : Game Designer, Music Manager,  Story Creator - instagram.com/f.annaufal
